Anderson M. Blackburn to Abraham Lincoln, 8 April 18491 I have to day according to your request written to theP. O. DepreccommendingA L Sturgessfor P. M. here–2I have consulted with our most prominent men & find that he is their choice & a very

suitable man & withal a goodWhig I am anxious to get the last report of theComrof Patents– Have you one to spare or can you tell me where I can get one
